title: Planeta at Wine Paris 2026 - Planeta
text: Planeta will once again take part in Wine Paris, one of the leading international events dedicated to wine and spirits. The fair will be held in Paris from February 9 to 11, at Paris Expo Porte de Versailles. We will be exhibiting as ISWA co-exhibitors in Hall 5.2 â€“ Stand F207, where visitors will be able to taste a selection of our wines and meet the Planeta team. We look forward to seeing you in Paris.
